fields.description:
If a tableView with GROUPED style (iOS only) has TableViewSection with custom headerView, the headersView's height will be fixed with the "auto" property instead of Ti.UI.SIZE (not tested on PLAIN tableView's style).

I put an example code.
fields.summary: iOS: TableViewSection headerView height set as 'auto', not Ti.UI.SIZE

comments.body:
Tested and confirmed on 2.1.4 GA, 3.0.2 GA and 3.1 CI.

Note that 'auto' actually defaults to Ti.UI.FILL on table views, however Ti.UI.FILL doesn't work either and I think it's due to a problem with the label itself not resizing. Someone else in the community said "FILL works, but the height information on label is still not there right after I add it to a view".

Same behavior with PLAIN style.
